abstract: Dennis Aogo (born 14 January 1987) is a German footballer of Nigerian descent. who plays as a left back for Schalke 04 with a contract running until 2017, after being purchased following a loan deal from Hamburger SV
comment: Dennis Aogo (born 14 January 1987) is a German footballer of Nigerian descent. who plays as a left back for Schalke 04 with a contract running until 2017, after being purchased following a loan deal from Hamburger SV
